Virtual currencies plummeted yesterday and today  causing many investors to lose their money. Do you know why it fell?

The first reason: Musk canceled the decision to use Bitcoin to directly buy Tesla cars  including his mention of Dogecoin as a fraud in a variety show. The second reason: Chinese officials once again stated that China is not allowed People trade virtual currency  and trading virtual currency is a violation.
